ygData.subject: Re: Lore stuff (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: that is correct.  it is now pending lore, and even if it was not lore it can only be used in primary hand.  the same case with the crystalline blade. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
that is correct. it is now pending lore, and even if it was not lore it can
only be used in primary hand. the same case with the crystalline blade.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 49 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 6 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Codo the Mysterious [mailto:codo@...]
> Sent: Sunday, July 04, 1999 10:41 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lore stuff (OT)
>
>
> From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
> > While I too would love to be able to have 2 Demon Claws
> because I think it
> > would look cool, I am becoming more and more convinced that
> weapons of
> > varrying speeds make little difference when combatting spellcasters.
> >
>
> Well, there is two strikes against a person wielding dual
> Demon Claws. Not
> only is it a lore item, but it has been tagged as primary
> hand only (or so
> I've been told)
>
>
> Lulen
> Bard of the 12th Chrous
> Solusek Ro
